statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[:RESOURCE]->(n:EC2KeyPair) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:EC2Instance)<-[r:SSH_LOGIN_TO]-(:EC2KeyPair) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: {AWS_ID}})-[r:RESOURCE]->(:EC2KeyPair) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
